item.title: Drue
item.description: drue This is a showcase of a bit of software I've been writing. I am a newbie drummer and wanted to spice up some practice with a light show so this links the lights in my room (Philips HUE bulbs) with my drumkit. I haven't opened the repository for the codebase yet. But if there is demand I will tidy it up and put it on github. Demo: A few things to note I only show you 2 ‘modes’ that I've implemented:
